filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Glow of object's own color at the edges
filter.inkscape:label: ring glow
ring inset lightness-contrast
filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Increase or decrease lightness and contrast

flowRoot.flowPara: Apply glow effects using filters. You might need to ungroup the circle elements before applying. You can change the flood color of the "ring shadow" effect to make it white if you want to make the logo usable on a dark background.
For logo specifics, refer to rt_logo.svg
"Raw": font ITC Eras Std Ultra, appears in Inkscape as
"Therapee": font ITC Eras Std Medium, appears in Inkscape as
Version: font ITC Eras Std Bold, appears in Inkscape as

text.tspan: RawTherapee splash screen design version 1.1 from 2017-01-28 | www.rawtherapee.com
